name: Moony Clicker
description:
Moony Clicker is a clicker idle game mostly inspired on classic Cookie Clicker but instead of baking cookies you will collect rocks on the Moon to upgrade your mining operations. 

Development of this game:

I started to learn programming and game development 3 months ago and this is my first game. I love Cookie Clicker and idle games in general and making one myself was one of my first goals in my learning journey. For the initial phase of development I've decided to stick to the classic formula and replicate what I know it works but I have some ideas that could work to add more detph and mechanics to the game. 

Dev Note: 

This game is Currently in: Alpha 0.1 

Planned features:

  • More shop upgrades
  • Original soundtrack
  • Better UX/UI
  • Prettier pixel art
  • Save system
